title: GovernanceDecision
description: An immutable record of a governance-level decision that restricts behavior.

decision_id.description: Globally unique identifier for this decision event.

timestamp.description: Time at which the decision was finalized.

action_requested.description: High-level description of the action that was requested.

action_status.description: Final status of the requested action.

blocking_authority.description: The governance layer or rule that blocked the action.

irreversible.description: Indicates that this decision cannot be reversed or overridden.

audit_reference.description: Reference to an immutable audit trail or ledger entry.

notes.description: Optional contextual notes. No justification or outcome evaluation allowed.
